14482013.name: Balaka - Nayuchi
14482013.note: Many stops are missing such as Mbanila, Lambulila, Molipa, Chinyama.
14482013.description: Mixed train, that leaves from Balaka on thursday mornings at 09:40 and arrives at Nayuchi at around 14:30

14482643.name: Balaka - Bilila
14482643.note: I cannot find the last stop called Bilila. According to the source, it should be about 4km north of Farringdon. There is also a stop called Khwisa between Balaka and Farringdon missing from the map

14482644.note: I cannot find the last stop called Bilila. According to the source, it should be about 4km north of Farringdon. There is also a stop called Khwisa between Balaka and Farringdon missing from the map
